item.title: Gunmen kill nine in South Africa tavern attack
item.description: A further 10 people were injured in Bekkersdal after the perpetrators opened fire and "continued to shoot randomly".

item.title: Kings or kingmakers? Villa entering decisive run
item.description: Aston Villa have won nine straight matches to emerge as title contenders despite a poor start to the season. Could 2026 be their year?

item.title: Australian PM announces intelligence review as country mourns Bondi attack
item.description: Anthony Albanese says the country must be in a position to respond to "the rapidly changing security environment".

item.title: New Zealand openers break Test records against WI
item.description: New Zealand's Tom Latham and Devon Conway become the first openers in Test history to score centuries in both innings as the Kiwis set the West Indies...

item.title: Survivors 'nervous and sceptical' about release of remaining Epstein files
item.description: US lawmakers who pushed for the documents to be made public have criticised the initial release as incomplete.
